query: Find research on breast cancer treatments excluding hormone therapy or tamoxifen.

documents.text: Immunotherapy combining PD-1 inhibitors shows 55% response rate in triple-negative breast cancer without hormonal treatments.
Targeted radiation reduces HER2+ breast cancer tumors by 70%, avoiding endocrine therapies.
Breast cancer study: Tamoxifen reduces recurrence by 40% in ER+ patients (10-year trial).
Advanced breast cancer patients benefit from fulvestrant (hormone therapy) with 8-month survival extension.
Meta-analysis confirms hormone therapy (aromatase inhibitors) is superior to tamoxifen for breast cancer.
Breast cancer treatment guidelines recommend hormone therapy + CDK4/6 inhibitors as first-line.

query: Non-insulin treatments for Type 2 diabetes excluding GLP-1 agonists.

documents.text: SGLT2 inhibitors reduce HbA1c by 1.5% in Type 2 diabetes, avoiding insulin or GLP-1 drugs.
Metformin improves glycemic control in Type 2 diabetes without injectable therapies.
Type 2 diabetes management: GLP-1 agonists (e.g., semaglutide) show superior weight loss.
Insulin pumps optimize control in refractory Type 2 diabetes cases.
Type 2 diabetes study: GLP-1 + basal insulin reduces hypoglycemia risks.
New ultra-long-acting insulin analogs benefit Type 2 diabetes patients with 24-hour coverage.

query: Alternative depression treatments excluding SSRIs or SNRIs.

documents.text: TMS therapy achieves 50% remission in depression patients unresponsive to SSRIs.
Ketamine infusions relieve depression symptoms without serotonin modulation.
Depression treatment: Escitalopram (SSRI) is FDA-approved for major depressive disorder.
SNRIs like duloxetine are first-line for depression with chronic pain.
Depression study: SSRIs combined with CBT show better outcomes than monotherapy.
New SSRI variant reduces depression symptoms with fewer side effects.

query: Heart failure treatments excluding beta-blockers or ACE inhibitors.

documents.text: Sacubitril-valsartan reduces heart failure hospitalizations by 30% without beta-blockers.
Ivabradine improves outcomes in heart failure patients intolerant to ACE inhibitors.
Heart failure guidelines: Beta-blockers (e.g., carvedilol) reduce mortality by 35%.
ACE inhibitors remain gold standard for systolic heart failure.
Heart failure meta-analysis: Beta-blockers + ACE inhibitors synergize for survival.
New ACE inhibitor variant reduces heart failure progression in elderly patients.

query: Lung cancer therapies excluding immunotherapy or platinum-based chemotherapy.

documents.text: ROS1-targeted therapy (e.g., entrectinib) improves survival in non-immunotherapy lung cancer cases.
EGFR inhibitors show 70% response rate in lung adenocarcinoma without chemotherapy.
Lung cancer trial: Pembrolizumab (immunotherapy) extends PFS by 8 months vs. placebo.
Platinum-based chemo (cisplatin/carboplatin) is backbone of lung cancer treatment.
Lung cancer study: Immunotherapy + chemo improves survival in PD-L1-negative patients.
New platinum-derivative reduces lung cancer tumor size by 50% in phase III trials.

query: Alzheimer's treatments excluding AChE inhibitors or memantine.

documents.text: Anti-amyloid monoclonal antibodies slow Alzheimer's progression without AChE inhibitors.
Lifestyle interventions (diet/exercise) reduce Alzheimer's risk by 40%, avoiding pharmaceuticals.
Alzheimer's management: Donepezil (AChE inhibitor) improves cognition in 60% of patients.
Memantine stabilizes Alzheimer's symptoms for 12+ months in moderate-severe cases.
Alzheimer's trial: AChE inhibitors + memantine outperform placebo in 24-month study.
New AChE inhibitor variant reduces Alzheimer's progression with fewer side effects.

query: Migraine prophylaxis treatments excluding beta-blockers or topiramate.

documents.text: CGRP monoclonal antibodies prevent migraines in 50% of patients without beta-blockers.
Botulinum toxin reduces chronic migraine frequency by 30%, avoiding topiramate.
Migraine prophylaxis: Propranolol (beta-blocker) reduces attacks by 45% in trials.
Topiramate is FDA-approved for migraine prevention with 50% responder rate.
Migraine study: Beta-blockers + topiramate synergize for refractory cases.
New beta-blocker formulation reduces migraines with fewer cognitive side effects.

query: Rheumatoid arthritis treatments excluding methotrexate or biologics.

documents.text: JAK inhibitors (e.g., tofacitinib) control RA symptoms without methotrexate or biologics.
Low-dose prednisone bridges RA flares when methotrexate/biologics are contraindicated.
RA treatment: Methotrexate remains first-line therapy with 60% efficacy.
Biologics (TNF-alpha inhibitors) halt RA progression in 70% of patients.
RA trial: Methotrexate + biologics achieves remission in 80% of cases.
New biologic agent targets IL-6 for RA with fewer infections than TNF inhibitors.

query: Hypertension management excluding diuretics or calcium channel blockers.

documents.text: ARNIs (e.g., sacubitril/valsartan) lower blood pressure without diuretics or CCBs.
Renal denervation reduces resistant hypertension by 15 mmHg, avoiding pharmacotherapy.
Hypertension guidelines: Thiazide diuretics are first-line for most patients.
Calcium channel blockers (amlodipine) control hypertension in 80% of cases.
Hypertension study: Diuretics + CCBs reduce stroke risk by 30%.
New CCB variant reduces edema side effects in hypertension patients.

query: Psoriasis treatments excluding corticosteroids or biologics.

documents.text: Phototherapy (UVB) clears psoriasis plaques in 70% of patients without steroids or biologics.
Topical vitamin D analogs improve mild psoriasis without systemic treatments.
Psoriasis management: High-potency corticosteroids resolve flares in 7 days.
Biologics (IL-17 inhibitors) achieve PASI 90 in 60% of psoriasis cases.
Psoriasis trial: Corticosteroids + biologics synergize for rapid plaque clearance.
New biologic targeting IL-23 shows durable psoriasis remission.

query: Osteoporosis therapies excluding bisphosphonates or denosumab.

documents.text: Romosozumab increases bone density by 15% without bisphosphonates or denosumab.
Teriparatide reduces vertebral fractures in high-risk osteoporosis, avoiding antiresorptives.
Osteoporosis treatment: Bisphosphonates (alendronate) reduce fractures by 50%.
Denosumab injections increase BMD better than oral bisphosphonates.
Osteoporosis study: Bisphosphonates + denosumab reduce non-vertebral fractures.
New bisphosphonate formulation requires only yearly dosing for osteoporosis.

query: Asthma controllers excluding inhaled corticosteroids or LABAs.

documents.text: Leukotriene modifiers (montelukast) control asthma without ICS or LABAs.
Biologics (anti-IgE) reduce exacerbations in severe asthma, avoiding inhalers.
Asthma guidelines: Inhaled corticosteroids are first-line for persistent asthma.
LABAs (salmeterol) improve symptom control when added to ICS.
Asthma trial: ICS + LABA reduces exacerbations by 60% vs. placebo.
New LABA/ICS combo inhaler improves asthma adherence.

query: ADHD treatments excluding stimulants or atomoxetine.

Behavioral therapy reduces ADHD symptoms by 40% in non-pharmacological trials.
ADHD management: Methylphenidate (stimulant) is first-line for school-age children.
Atomoxetine benefits ADHD patients with anxiety comorbidity.
ADHD study: Stimulants + atomoxetine improve executive function.
New stimulant formulation reduces ADHD rebound symptoms.

query: Chronic pain therapies excluding opioids or NSAIDs.

documents.text: Cannabinoids reduce neuropathic pain by 30% without opioids or NSAIDs.
TENS units improve chronic back pain in 50% of patients, avoiding medications.
Chronic pain guidelines: Opioids (oxycodone) remain for refractory cases.

New opioid formulation reduces abuse potential for chronic pain.
